title: This guy is too much
body:
I  have been played this game for few years and I deeply believe that League of Legends is a game with no tolerance of any kind of racism and hate speech. During the game I played just now, a player just constantly expressed racism speech towards Chinese and used terms like " Chinese dog" to humiliate billions of people. As a Chinese myself, I think I have the responsibility to disclose this matter and call for your serious attention.

I have more photos as proof if you guys request .

replies.body: name and shame is a no no

Dang, I've had a similar problem with these types of players. I was in a game a few weeks ago and a player said to me that I had "%%%%%%%%%%% eyes and I looked like all the other Asians". I didn't even know he knew I was Asian but he just said it anyway. The best tip from me is to just ignore it and move on. Report that player after the game and bam. You won't see that player ever again (depending on the situation)

(Also, next time don't put the user's name and shame them)
(It's against the rules)

As others have mentioned, please remove the name and shame. It is against board rules.

However if you have screenshot evidence, you can submit it to support so an actual person will look into it for you. You'll get a response back along the lines of "Please keep in mind; we cannot disclose any disciplinary actions that may be taken due to privacy reasons." but rest assured that someone has seen it.

Sorry but can you please remove the name.
Name and shaming is not allowed, I know it sucks but there is a reason for it.

Just report him, and if you think you absolutely have too, submit a support ticket with your "Proof"
